sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The mplayer package contains mplayer, gmplayer and mencoder.

sect3.title: mplayer
sect3.para: mplayer manages the input formats, the codecs and the output formats to display video files on your screen.

sect3.title: gmplayer
sect3.para: gmplayer is MPlayer with a graphical user interface.

sect3.title: mencoder
sect3.para: mencoder is used to encode any MPlayer-playable movie to DivX4, XviD or any codec in libavcodec with PCM/MP3/VBRMP3 audio.
